Package mmj.mmio

Class SrcStmt

java.lang.Object
mmj.mmio.SrcStmt
public class SrcStmt extends Object
Simple data structure holding "work" components of a MetaMath source statement.
See Also:
  • Nomenclature and Entity-Relationship Notes

  • Field Details

    • seq

      public int seq
      Every SrcStmt has a sequence number, even a comment.

      Note: this seq is not necessarily the same value stored in LogicalSystem or whatever object implements SystemLoader. Both are sequential (ha), but LogicalSystem may use a multiplier or transform the sequence number in some other way.

    • label

      public String label
      VarHyp, LogHyp, Theorem and Axiom have labels.

    • column

      public int column
      The column that a VarHyp, LogHyp, Theorem or Axiom starts at.

    • keyword

      public String keyword
      Every SrcStmt has a keyword, even a comment (char 1 = '$', always.)

    • typ

      public String typ
      VarHyp, LogHyp, Theorem and Axiom have typ, which internally corresponds to the first symbol of a Formula externally, is the first symbol following the Metamath statement's keyword ($a, $p, etc.)

    • symList

      public List<String> symList
      symlist is the 2nd through nth symbols in the Metamath source statement.

      DjVar, Var, Cnst, VarHyp, LogHyp, Theorem and Axiom have symList: 

           DjVar:                   at least 2 sym Strings
     Var & Cnst:              at least 1
     VarHyp:                  exactly 1, guaranteed :)
     Axiom, LogHyp & Theorem: zero or more

    • proofList

      public List<String> proofList
      Only Theorem statements ($p) have proofList.

      proofList is guaranteed to have at least one proofStep string (which will be label of a statement... or "?").

      Note: if proofBlockList not null then proofList contains the labels inside the parenthesized portion of a compressed proof (but not the parentheses.)

    • proofBlockList

      public BlockList proofBlockList
      Theorem compressed proof block list.

      Null value signifies proof is not compressed. Otherwise, contains 1 or more Strings containing Metamath compressed proof symbols (see Metamath.pdf Appendix B).

    • comment

      public String comment
      Comment statement --

      This is the entire comment excluding the start/end comment keywords. All other tokens are present, including the intervening whitespace newlines.

    • includeFileName

      public String includeFileName
      Include File Name from "$[" statement.

      Does not include the $[, $] tokens or the whitespace chunks, just the file name.

  • Constructor Details

    • SrcStmt

      public SrcStmt(int seqNbr, String keyword)
      Construct using sequence number and MetaMath keyword.
      Parameters:
      seqNbr - the sequence number of the source statement
      keyword - the MetaMath source keyword token
